AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: prize chicken
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made [PAWN_nameDef] part of the coop. [PAWN_pronoun] was allowed to leave once [PAWN_pronoun]'d "paid [PAWN_possessive] due."
